game.gfx

Class GameWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
      • game.gfx.GameWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.newdawn.slick.ControlledInputReciever, org.newdawn.slick.ControllerListener, org.newdawn.slick.InputListener, org.newdawn.slick.KeyListener, org.newdawn.slick.MouseListener, org.newdawn.slick.state.GameState

    public class GameWindow
extends org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
    GameWindow class provides an interactive game

      • movePlane

        private void movePlane(Plane plane)
        Moves a plane

        If the plane is under manual control, it will follow the bearing specified by the player.

        If the plane is following its flight path, it will tend towards its next target.

        Parameters:
        plane - the plane to move

      • getHeightFromAltitude

      • enter

        public void enter(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gameContainer,
         org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame game)
           throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Sets properties which need resetting each time the state is accessed

        Specifically, this clears the game so that it restarts when exited and re-entered.

        Specified by:
        enter in interface org.newdawn.slick.state.GameState
        Overrides:
        enter in class org.newdawn.slick.state.BasicGameState
        Parameters:
        gameContainer - the game container holding this state
        game - the game running this state
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
